name: The Dark Forest (The-Last-Samurai)
description:
made for VimJam: Collectables(8 Bits to Infinity)

there is 3 dungeons each     with different bosses to defeat, a random dungeon is picked each time you enter the portal.

use w a s d to move.

use left click for basic attack.

use right click for power attack after you unlock it.

use shift for dash after you unlock it.

press jump button twice (w, or space bar) for double jump after you unlock it.

Known Bugs: normal enemy health doesn't update until the second hit, but   boss health works fine for some reason, enemies can get glitched  and go into a run animation until you walk away from them.

I will try to fix all of these bugs after the jam is over.

this  is my first attempt at a rogue-like game, enjoy!
